page.title: 05CLUBS Recreation
page.content: {Synchronised Swimming Several of us go to a synchronised swimming club. It started last year. We do different moves and dances with music in the water.We are tested on our moves and can pass different awards.Some of the moves are tub, oyster, marlin, front pike, backward and forward somersaults. {BMX Cycling We go to a club called Burgess Hill Bombers. It is a BMX club. We have our BMX bikes scrutineered for safety. We race fortnightly in the summer and monthly in the winter.The first jump is the speed jump then the table top, the narker, woops and the plain wing. {Majorettes} At majorettes we learn to twirl a baton. We go out to display at local functions and go on long marches once a month. It is at Oakmeeds School.
